mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (memberEmail, memberPw, memberSubEmail, memberRegionCity, memberRegionDistrict, memberName, memberPhone) VALUES (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberSubEmail}, #{memberRegionCity}, #{memberRegionDistrict}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Member WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail};
SELECT * FROM Member WHERE memberEmail = #{memberEmail} AND memberPw = #{memberPw};
SELECT * FROM Member WHERE memberName = #{memberName} AND memberPhone = #{memberPhone};
